Real■Cause Project Pack (3 Projects) Project Details + Study Topics For: Full■Stack Beginner + ML Basics Student (You) Date: 25 Jan 2026 Use this as a build guide for a 2■person team. Each project includes: real■world cause, modules, ML features, full■stack features, recommended stack, and separate study topics for each teammate. 1) Smart Food Donation & Hunger Rescue Platform Real■World Cause  Connect food donors (restaurants, hostels, events) to NGOs/volunteers for fast pickup & delivery.  Reduce edible food waste and improve last■mile distribution to people in need. Key Modules Core Modules  Donor posting: food type, quantity, expiry timer, location, optional image  NGO/Volunteer claiming + pickup & delivery tracking  Admin verification + analytics dashboard Optional Add■Ons  Pickup priority scoring (rank urgent donations first)  Donation hotspot heatmap (where donations happen most)  Notifications (SMS/email/app) ML Features (AI/ML Student)  Pickup Priority Model (urgent / medium / low)  Spoilage Risk Prediction (low / medium / high)  Hotspot clustering (KMeans) + trend analytics Full■Stack Features (Full■Stack Student)  Role■based login (Donor / NGO / Admin)  Donation feed + map view + filters (near me)  Claim workflow + live status updates  Admin dashboard (reports, success rate, daily stats) Suggested Tech Stack  Frontend: React + Tailwind  Backend: FastAPI (Python)  Database: Firebase Firestore or MongoDB Atlas  Maps: Google Maps API or Mapbox  Storage: Cloudinary or Firebase Storage  Deploy: Vercel (frontend) + Render/Railway (backend) Separate Study Topics Full■Stack beginner (learn these)  React basics: components, props, state, hooks (useState/useEffect), routing
 Forms & validation + image upload
 FastAPI basics + REST CRUD APIs
 JWT authentication + role■based access control
 Firestore/MongoDB CRUD + schema design
 Maps integration (markers, radius filter, geolocation)
 Deployment + .env management
 Optional: real■time updates (Firebase realtime / WebSockets) ML basics student (learn these)  Pandas preprocessing + feature engineering (time left, distance, food type)
 Classification + metrics (precision/recall/F1)
 Clustering (KMeans) for hotspots
 Save/load model (joblib/pickle)
 Expose inference via FastAPI endpoint
 Basic analytics & charts (matplotlib/plotly)
 Optional: scoring/ranking logic and calibration 2) Blood Donation Matching + Emergency Broadcast System Real■World Cause  Match emergency blood requests with nearby donors instantly using smart ranking + alerts.  Improve response speed and reduce dependence on unstructured WhatsApp/phone calls. Key Modules Core Modules  Donor registration: blood group, location, availability, last donation date  Patient/Hospital request creation: group, units, urgency, location  Auto■matching + accept/decline + request status tracking Optional Add■Ons  OTP phone verification  Broadcast alerts to top matches  Response history logs (time to respond, accepted/declined) ML Features (AI/ML Student)  Response Probability Prediction (who is likely to accept quickly)  Smart donor ranking (distance + probability score)  Optional demand forecasting by blood group/season Full■Stack Features (Full■Stack Student)  Donor + Hospital dashboards  Radius search using distance calculation  Request lifecycle (created → accepted → fulfilled/closed)  Notifications via SMS/email/push Suggested Tech Stack  Frontend: React + Tailwind  Backend: FastAPI (Python)  Database: Firebase / MongoDB Atlas  Notifications: Twilio SMS or Firebase Cloud Messaging  Maps: Google Maps / Mapbox  Deploy: Vercel + Render/Railway Separate Study Topics Full■Stack beginner (learn these)  React forms (multi■step registration) + API integration (axios/fetch)
 FastAPI CRUD + validation with Pydantic
 JWT auth + protected routes
 Distance calculation (Haversine) + radius filtering logic
 Notifications integration (SMS/email/push)
 Database schema + indexing basics
 Deployment + basic security (rate limiting optional) ML basics student (learn these)  Binary classification (Logistic Regression / RandomForest)
 Feature engineering (distance, urgency, time, last donation date, history)
 Ranking/scoring system (match score)
 Evaluation (ROC-AUC/F1) + threshold selection
 Model persistence + FastAPI inference endpoint
 Analytics: fulfilled rate, avg response time 3) Pothole / Garbage Reporting with AI Detection (Civic Tech) Real■World Cause  Citizens report potholes/garbage with images; AI detects type & severity; authorities/NGOs track fixes.  Improves road safety, cleanliness, and provides transparent resolution tracking. Key Modules Core Modules  Complaint submission: image + geo■location + description  AI tag: pothole / garbage / other + severity score  Admin dashboard + map + status updates timeline Optional Add■Ons  Duplicate merging (same location reports)  Public page for resolved issues  Hotspot heatmap + monthly analytics ML Features (AI/ML Student)  Image classification (pothole vs garbage vs normal)  Optional object detection (YOLO) + severity from bounding box area  Optional fake/irrelevant report filtering Full■Stack Features (Full■Stack Student)  Image upload pipeline + cloud storage  Map dashboard with filters (type, severity, date)  Status workflow (pending → in■progress → resolved)  Admin tools (merge duplicates, assign/close issues) Suggested Tech Stack  Frontend: React + Tailwind  Backend: FastAPI (Python)  Database: MongoDB / Firebase  Storage: Cloudinary / Firebase Storage  Computer Vision: PyTorch/TensorFlow + OpenCV (+ Ultralytics YOLO optional)  Deploy: Vercel + Render/Railway Separate Study Topics Full■Stack beginner (learn these)  React image upload + preview + progress UI
 Cloud storage integration (Cloudinary/Firebase Storage)
 FastAPI upload endpoints + error handling
 Maps API (markers, clustering, filters)
 Admin dashboard tables + search/sort
 Role■based auth for admin routes
 Deployment + logging/monitoring basics ML basics student (learn these)  Computer vision basics + transfer learning (MobileNet/ResNet)
 Dataset handling + augmentation (Albumentations)
 Training & evaluation of image classifier
 Optional: YOLO object detection (Ultralytics)
 Serving model via FastAPI (inference speed optimizations)
 Model optimization: resizing, batching, lightweight models
